summary: Allows the crafting of the Dragon Priest Masks as rings.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple little mod that allows you to craft 9 different rings that are enchanted with the 9 enchantments from the Dragon Priest Marks. This is my first mod and still very much a work in progress. All comments are welcome.

Since version 0.2 9 new recipes have been added that allows you to duplicate any of the dragon priest masks you currently have and then use those new copies to forge the rings. This way you have to obtained the mask before you can make the ring.
The cost of duplicating a mask is current a filled black soul gem, a dragon bone, a dragon scales and the mask you want to duplicate. The recipes make 2 mask, the original one you used in the recipe, plus the new duplicate you can use to make the rings.

What the mod adds:
9 new rings that can be crafted at any forge under the jewelry category.
9 new recipes that allow you to make copies of the dragon masks you currently have under the Daedric category.

What is required:
Skyrim updated to at least 1.8.
Load order really shouldn\'t matter as the mod doesn\'t add anything new to the game.

How to install:
Simply extract the .esp file into your Data folder contained within your Skyrim folder or use NMM.

Future updates:
-Add 4 more rings that have the enchantments for the 4 new Dragon Priest Masks from Dragonborn.
-Make all rings for the left hand.
-Make enchanted necklace versions of each ring.
-And anything else that I end up thinking of or anything that is requested.

If anyone has any ideas on how to make the mod better or anything I can add feel free to comment.

Thanks and happy playing!
author: DisturbedAngel

files.name: Dragon Priest Rings
files.changelogHtml:
Added 9 new recipes for making copies of the dragon priest masks.
Changed the recipes of the rings so that you have to have the mask corresponding to the ring before you can make it.
